commit.message:
posix.h (_Jv_platform_usleep): Wrap in ifdef JV_HASH_SYNCHRONIZATION.

	* include/posix.h (_Jv_platform_usleep): Wrap in ifdef
	JV_HASH_SYNCHRONIZATION.
	* include/win32.h (_Jv_platform_usleep): Wrap in ifdef
	JV_HASH_SYNCHRONIZATION.
